quests.desc: Who's got a virtual machine and is about to play through an exciting round of TextWorld? You do! Here is your task for today. First thing I need you to do is to venture south. If you can succeed at that, recover the formless key from the toolbox. Having got the formless key, attempt to travel north. Then, insert the formless key into the formless locker's lock to unlock it. And then, open the formless locker. After opening the formless locker, pick up the type V passkey from the formless locker inside the bar. And then, make it so that the type V safe in the bar is unlocked with the type V passkey. Then, make sure that the type V safe is wide open. After that, take the blanket from the type V safe within the bar. Then, place the blanket into the chest. Got that? Good!
commands: unlock formless locker with formless key
take type V passkey from formless locker
unlock type V safe with type V passkey
take blanket from type V safe
unlock formless locker with formless key
take type V passkey from formless locker
unlock type V safe with type V passkey
take blanket from type V safe

infos.name: bar
infos.desc:
You've entered a bar.

 You see [if c_0 is locked]a locked[else if c_0 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] chest.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The chest contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The chest is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You make out [if c_1 is locked]a locked[else if c_1 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] type V safe.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The type V safe contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The type V safe is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You see [if c_2 is locked]a locked[else if c_2 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] formless locker.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The formless locker contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] The formless locker is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading west. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south.

walkthrough: unlock formless locker with formless key
take type V passkey from formless locker
unlock type V safe with type V passkey
take blanket from type V safe

objective: Welcome to another fast paced session of TextWorld! First thing I need you to do is to make an attempt to go south. Then, take the formless key from the toolbox. After that, go north. That done, make sure that the formless locker in the bar is unlocked with the formless key. And then, ensure that the formless locker inside the bar is open. Then, recover the type V passkey from the formless locker inside the bar. If you can get your hands on the type V passkey, unlock the type V safe. After that, ensure that the type V safe is open. After that, recover the blanket from the type V safe within the bar. Then, you can put the blanket inside the chest in the bar. Alright, thanks!
